snippet.title: Aeon Drive - Guerrilla Collective Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
"Aeon Drive" coming to Steam and consoles in 2021 🔜 

Get the demo at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1252240/Aeon_Drive/

Rush through the cyberpunk landscapes of Neo Barcelona in Aeon Drive, an action-platformer with a speedrunning twist! Whether solo or in up to 4 player co-op, sprint and dash through many areas of the neon-infused city - and use your time and space-bending abilities to get ahead.

Follow "Aeon Drive" and be up to date with the latest news:

▶️Twitter: https://twitter.com/AeonDrive
▶️Discord: http://discord.gg/RfKxxFE


--
| About the developer |

"We used to make things fly into space, now we make awesome games and partner with other awesome indies devs!"

Follow along for more exciting Indie game news:

▶️ Website: http://2awesomestudio.com​​
▶️ Discord: https://discord.gg/2awesomestudio​​
▶️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/2awesomestudio
